summary: This bill, the Ensuring Access to Essential Drugs Act, aims to amend Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to exempt specific drugs from the Part D manufacturer discount program under Medicare. It focuses on orally administered drugs that have received approval under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act and have been granted a narrow exception allowing reclassification as a noninnovator multiple source drug under the Medicaid drug rebate program by the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.
